translation: When King Śuddhodana saw this miraculous sign, he gave rise to a rare feeling of wonder and said, “Formerly when the Tathāgata was a prince, he did not give rise to thoughts of affection for the rich and powerful ruler

translation: In the great manifold cosmos of one thousand buddha-worlds he is the king of the Dharma. Endowed with holy treasures and supernatural powers, he always receives the respect of heavenly beings.

source_sentence: 勝過於彼，不可比喻。

translation: The most honored and the most superior, there's nothing higher than that, which transcends old age, illness, and death and reaches the limit of suffering.'

translation: When I saw this, my heart was overjoyed and greeted him with veneration.

translation: I abandoned my family until I became a buddha, and then I met with my father the king for the first time.

translation: After he had this thought, he descended from the sky.

translation: I take refuge in the supreme great hero Who skillfully leads and inspires living beings.

translation: Endowed with great virtue, knowledge, and fame, They are unequaled in all the worlds.

source_sentence: 歸依最勝大丈夫，　　勝慧深廣難思議，
translation: They take refuge in the supreme great hero, Their transcendent wisdom profound and inconceivable.

translation: Again, he presented all the priceless treasures in the ocean to the Tathāgata.

translation: Due to the spiritual power of Buddha, they cause this sound of music to pervade a billion worlds of three thousand great manifold continents.

source_sentence: 「願我常親近，　　牟尼大導師，
translation: “May I always associate with the great teacher Muni,

source_sentence: 設最上供養，　　得盡諸苦際。」
translation: If you make the highest offering, you'll attain the end of suffering.

source_sentence: 時阿修羅王作供養已，與其眷屬，心大歡喜，合掌向佛，重說偈言：爾時會中復有阿修羅王名曰極喜，
translation: Having made these offerings, the asura king and his retinue were greatly delighted. They joined their palms in respect to the Buddha and again spoke these verses: At that time there was also an asura king in the assembly, named

source_sentence: 發清淨心，廣興供養，一一供養與尾摩唧怛囉阿修羅王等無有異。
translation: They give rise to a pure mind and make extensive offerings, each one no different from those of the asuras kings like Vimalakīrti-nirdeśa.

source_sentence: 「歸依無上十力尊，　　具修無邊真實行，
translation: “I take refuge in the supreme honored One of the Ten-Powers, Who cultivates boundless true practice.

source_sentence: 決定了達一切法，　　永斷諸惑得無畏。
translation: Determined to understand all things, They permanently cut off all afflictions and attain fearlessness.

source_sentence: 歸依三界大導師，　　解脫有愛諸結縛，
translation: Taking refuge in the great leaders of the three realms, They are liberated from the bonds of craving.

source_sentence: 己超菩提勝彼岸，　　復能拯拔沈溺者。
translation: He himself transcends enlightenment and surpasses the other side, and he's also able to rescue those who are submerged in it.

source_sentence: 如來善說出離道，　　眾生聞已咸信受，
translation: The Buddha well explains the path of liberation; Having heard it, sentient beings believe and accept it.

source_sentence: 皆令清淨滌諸染，　　猶若蓮花不著水。
translation: They'll all become pure and wash away defilements, just like lotus flowers that aren't attached to water.

source_sentence: 牟尼勝智善觀察，　　了諸法空亦無相，
translation: The supreme knowledge of the Sage observes well, Understanding that all things are void and signless.

source_sentence: 不著一切有為行，　　譬如虛空無所依。」
translation: They don't cling to all conditioned actions, like space that has no basis.

source_sentence: 作供養已，乘七寶車繞佛三匝，合掌向佛，以偈讚曰：爾時會中復有阿修羅王，
translation: Having made this offering, he rode the seven-jeweled chariot and circumambulated the Buddha three times. He joined his palms in respect toward the Buddha and praised him in verse: At that time there was also an asura king among the assem

source_sentence: 名曰妙臂，發清淨心廣興供養，一一供養與極喜阿修羅王等無有異。
translation: He's called Marvelous Arm, who arouses a pure mind and makes extensive offerings, each offering no different from that of the supremely joyful asura king.

source_sentence: 「稽首吉祥調御師，　　天中世間無與等，
translation: They bow their heads to the auspicious tamer, Who is unequaled in heaven and earth.

source_sentence: 了知眾生性本空，　　但有假想如陽焰，
translation: They know the nature of sentient beings is inherently empty, Yet they have no ideation of existence as a mirage.

source_sentence: 無作無受無眾生，　　無我無人無彼此，
translation: Nothing is made, nothing receives, nothing is sentient being, nothing is self, nothing is person, nothing is other.

source_sentence: 無言無說自性空，　　諸法本來常寂靜。
translation: The self-nature of words and expressions is empty; All things are originally eternally quiescent.

source_sentence: 推求諸法不可得，　　則於佛教善入解，
translation: If you deduce that all dharmas are ungraspable, Then you’ll enter understanding of Buddhism.

source_sentence: 是人得名法王子，　　隨順先佛之所行。
translation: That person will be called the prince of the Dharma, Following the ways of the buddhas of the past.

source_sentence: 我今於佛伸供養，　　調伏難化諸眾生，
translation: I now extend my offerings to the Buddha, Subduing sentient beings who have difficulty teaching.

source_sentence: 以此稱讚少善根，　　迴向自他皆作佛。」
translation: Because of this, he praises the few good roots and dedicates them to self and others as buddhas.

source_sentence: 作供養已，乘七寶車，繞佛三匝，手捧金栗散如來上，合掌向佛，以偈讚曰：爾時會中復有阿修羅王，
translation: Having made this offering, he rode in a carriage drawn of the seven kinds of treasure and circumambulated the Buddha three times. He placed his palms together on the top of the Tathāgata’s head, faced him with his palms pressed

source_sentence: 名曰大力，發清淨心，廣興供養，一一供養與妙臂阿修羅王等無有異。
translation: His name was Mahāprajñāpāramitā, and he aroused the pure mind to make extensive offerings, each one no different from those of the Marvelous Arm King Asura.

source_sentence: 「稽首大法王，　　慧眼照三有，
translation: I bow my head in homage to the great king of the Dharma, Whose eye of wisdom illumines all beings.

source_sentence: 已渡生死海，　　到究竟彼岸。
translation: Having crossed the sea of birth and death, They reach the other shore.

source_sentence: 教導諸有情，　　除惑無怖畏，
translation: He teaches sentient beings to rid themselves of affliction and fearlessness.

source_sentence: 越四種瀑流，　　得至安隱處。
translation: By crossing over the four kinds of rivers, they'll attain a peaceful place.

source_sentence: 甚深微妙慧，　　窮世間源底，
translation: Their profound, subtle wisdom extends to the bottom of the worldly source.

source_sentence: 知眾生所欲，　　深著顛倒想。
translation: Knowing what sentient beings want, they're deeply attached to mistaken conceptions.

source_sentence: 常以大悲心，　　開示令覺悟，
translation: Always, with great compassion, They show and enlighten them.

source_sentence: 破彼邪妄智，　　具足真實見。
translation: To refute their mistaken wisdom, they are endowed with true views.

source_sentence: 了達一切法，　　無垢無所著，
translation: Understanding all things, Undefiled and unattached,

source_sentence: 如幻化陽焰，　　亦如水中月。
translation: It's like the miraculous mirage of a mirage, and it's like the moon in water.

source_sentence: 牟尼最勝尊，　　視眾生如子，
translation: The sage Muni, the supreme honored one, looks upon sentient beings as children.

source_sentence: 皆令修正行，　　不著於三世。
translation: He causes them all to cultivate practice and doesn't cling to the three worlds.

source_sentence: 如來出世間，　　了法皆虛假，
translation: The Tathāgata appears in the world, Understanding that all things are unreal.

source_sentence: 自性無所得，　　他性悉皆空。
translation: The self-nature is ungraspable, and the other natures are all empty.

source_sentence: 如世間愚夫，　　夢中受欲樂，
translation: Like foolish people in the world who experience desire and pleasure in a dream,

source_sentence: 畢竟不可得，　　應當如理思。」
translation: After all, it's unobtainable, so you should think according to the principle.

source_sentence: 作供養已，乘七寶車，繞佛三匝，以諸寶花而散佛上，合掌向佛，以偈讚曰：爾時會中復有阿修羅王，
translation: Having made this offering, he rode in a carriage of the seven kinds of treasure and circumambulated the Buddha three times. He scattered jeweled flowers over the Buddha. Holding his palms together [in respect] toward him, he praised him

source_sentence: 名曰羅睺，發清淨心，廣興供養，一一供養與大力阿修羅王等無有異。
translation: He was called Rāhu, who had a pure mind and made extensive offerings, each one no different from those of the greatly powerful asura king.

source_sentence: 作供養已，乘七寶車，繞佛三匝，復以上妙唧怛囉鉢吒羅花而散佛上，
translation: Having made these offerings, he rode the seven-jeweled chariot and circumambulated the Buddha three times. Then he scattered on top of the Buddha the flowers of the finest khaṭṭṭika blue lotus blossoms.

source_sentence: 「巍巍無上士，　　身光極晃耀，
translation: “A majestic and unsurpassed person’s body shines brilliantly,

source_sentence: 諸天及世人，　　無有如佛者。
translation: No gods and humans are like the Buddha.

source_sentence: 猶若以芥子，　　比於彌盧山，
translation: It's like comparing a mustard seed to Mount Miliṇḍa.

source_sentence: 亦如牛跡水，　　以況於溟渤。
translation: It's like the water of an ox-tract, so it's even more so when it's deep and vast.

source_sentence: 如來妙色相，　　世間無與等，
translation: The Tathāgata’s subtle form and characteristics Are unparalleled in the world.

source_sentence: 一一相端嚴，　　觀者心無厭。
translation: Each one of his features is dignified, and the observer's mind doesn't tire of it.

source_sentence: 妙相難思議，　　超過一切色，
translation: Their subtle features are inconceivable, Beyond all forms.

source_sentence: 如日照世間，　　餘光皆隱沒。
translation: Just as the sun illumines the world, The remaining light disappears.

source_sentence: 佛威德光明，　　映蔽諸天眾，
translation: The Buddha’s majestic light of great virtue Is reflected over the heavenly beings.

source_sentence: 如月現長空，　　星光皆晦昧。
translation: It's like when the moon appears long in space, and the starlight is all obscure.

source_sentence: 慧深如巨海，　　身相若金山，
translation: His wisdom is as deep as a great ocean, His physical form like a mountain of gold.

source_sentence: 佛身智光明，　　三界無倫匹。」
translation: The Buddha's body is the light of wisdom, which has no equal in the three realms.

source_sentence: 合掌向佛，以偈讚曰：爾時會中復有阿修羅王，名曰淨戒，發清淨心，
translation: He joined his palms to the Buddha and praised him in verse: At that time there was also an asura king named Pure Precepts, who had developed a pure mind.

source_sentence: 廣興供養，一一供養與羅睺阿修羅王等無有異。
translation: Each offering is no different from that of the Rāhu asura kings and so forth.

source_sentence: 作供養已，乘七寶車繞佛三匝，復以摩訶唧怛囉鉢吒羅花而散佛上，合掌向佛，
translation: Having made these offerings, he rode the seven-jeweled chariot and circumambulated the Buddha three times. Again, he scattered mahākauṣṭrapaṭala flowers over the Buddha and joined his palms in respect toward him.

source_sentence: 「牟尼具勝智光明，　　能破貪恚愚癡暗，
translation: “The sage is endowed with the light of supreme knowledge, Able to destroy the darkness of lust, hatred, and folly.

source_sentence: 成就最上奢摩他，　　降注法雨沃群品。
translation: Accomplishing the highest level of quietude, he sends down the Dharma rain to nourish all living beings.

source_sentence: 如來金剛座道場，　　熾然智炬照三有，
translation: The Buddha’s diamond seat of enlightenment Is the blazing torch of knowledge, Illumining all beings.

source_sentence: 能爇眾生煩惱薪，　　使無遺餘成灰燼。
translation: They can cut off the firewood of sentient beings’ afflictions And turn it into ashes without remainder.

source_sentence: 無量百千俱胝劫，　　積集任持妙法藏，
translation: Measureless hundreds of thousands of koṭis of kalpas They accumulated and maintained the wonderful treasury of truth.

source_sentence: 普施熱惱諸群迷，　　聞者皆如飲甘露。
translation: Giving to all the afflicted and confused, Those who hear it are like drinking ambrosia.

source_sentence: 如來出現於世間，　　能示眾生正法眼，
translation: The Buddha appears in the world, Able to show sentient beings the eye of truth.

source_sentence: 無明生死長夜中，　　智慧摩尼能顯照。」
translation: In the long night of nescience, birth and death, the maṇi of wisdom can illuminate.

source_sentence: 以偈讚曰：爾時會中復有阿修羅王，名喜鬪戰，發清淨心，廣興供養，
translation: He praised them in verse: At that time there was also an asura king named Mahāsudasvara, who liked to fight and arouse pure minds.

source_sentence: 一一供養與淨戒阿修羅王等無有異。
translation: Each offering is no different from that of the pure precepts asura king and so forth.

source_sentence: 作供養已，乘七寶車，繞佛三匝，復以上妙鉢吒羅花而散佛上，合掌向佛，
translation: Having made these offerings, they boarded the seven-jeweled chariot and circumambulated the Buddha three times. They also scattered beautiful blue lotus blossoms above the Buddha and joined their palms in respect toward him.

source_sentence: 「歸依聖主釋師子，　　於諸法中得無畏，
translation: “I take refuge in the noble lord, the lion Śākyamuni, Who has attained fearlessness in all things.

source_sentence: 猶如勇將擐甲冑，　　降伏他兵無怯弱。
translation: They're like a courageous general wearing armor, who subdues another's troops without weakness.

source_sentence: 能仁諸根常寂靜，　　不為煩惱所動亂，
translation: Their faculties of benevolence are always quiescent, Not disturbed by afflictions.

source_sentence: 永盡三毒一切垢，　　餘習展轉不復起。
translation: They permanently extinguish all the defilements of the three poisons, and the remaining accumulations don't arise again.

source_sentence: 如來六返觀眾生，　　無愛無憎無分別，
translation: The Buddha observes sentient beings for six rebirths Without craving, hating, or discriminating.

source_sentence: 安住無緣廣大慈，　　於冤親境悉平等。
translation: Abiding peacefully in unconditional, vast compassion, They are all equal to enemies and friends.

source_sentence: 佛知眾生種種想，　　各各開示袪諸妄，
translation: The Buddha knows the various conceptions of sentient beings, Each revealing their crude delusions.

source_sentence: 皆令善住正思惟，　　了心如幻無所著。」
translation: They all cause well-abiding correct contemplation, comprehending that mind as illusory and not attached to anything.

source_sentence: 以偈讚曰：爾時會中復有阿修羅王，名曰妙眼，發清淨心，廣興供養，
translation: He praised them in verse: At that time there was also an asura king named Marvelous Eye, who manifested pure minds and made extensive offerings to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 一一供養與喜鬪戰阿修羅王等無有異。
translation: Each offering is no different from that of the joy-fighting asura king and so forth.

source_sentence: 作供養已，乘七寶車，繞佛三匝，復以摩訶鉢吒羅花而散佛上，合掌向佛，
translation: Having made these offerings, they boarded the seven-jeweled chariot and circumambulated the Buddha three times. Again, they scattered mahāprajāpaṭala flowers over him and joined their palms in reverence toward him.

source_sentence: 「大威德世尊，　　了諸法實相，
translation: Bhagavān, the great and mighty one, Understands the true characteristics of all things.

source_sentence: 所謂諸法者，　　從因緣故有，
translation: The so-called dharmas exist by reason of causes and conditions.

source_sentence: 無法無非法，　　尋求不可得，
translation: What’s not lawful and what’s not lawful cannot be sought.

source_sentence: 若有法可說，　　此說唯假名。
translation: If there are dharmas that can be explained, this explanation is only a metaphor.

source_sentence: 如是種種相，　　本來常寂靜，
translation: Such various characteristics are originally always quiescent,

source_sentence: 無名亦無相，　　牟尼之所說。
translation: The absence of names and the absence of marks Is what the Sage Muni teaches.

source_sentence: 雖說而無說，　　少分不可得，
translation: Even though it is explained, there’s no explanation: partially ungraspable.

source_sentence: 說者既亦無，　　聽者亦如是。
translation: Since the speaker is also absent, So is the listener.

source_sentence: 善達如是義，　　不著一切法，
translation: Well comprehending such meanings, they don’t cling to all things.

source_sentence: 則能行大行，　　是名真佛子。」
translation: Then they'll be able to perform great deeds, which is called truly the Buddha-child.

source_sentence: 以偈讚曰：爾時會中復有阿修羅王，名越三世，發清淨心，廣興供養，
translation: At that time there was also an asura king named Vaiśravaṇa in the assembly. He transcended all times and, having arisen from a pure mind, he made extensive offerings to them.

source_sentence: 一一供養與妙眼阿修羅王等無有異。
translation: Each offering is no different from that of the asura king Marvelous Eyes.

source_sentence: 作供養已，乘七寶車，繞佛三匝，復以殊妙真珠瓔珞奉施如來，合掌向佛，
translation: Having made these offerings, he rode the seven-jeweled chariot and circumambulated the Buddha three times. He presented the Tathāgata with a necklace of exquisite pearls and joined his palms facing the Buddha.

source_sentence: 「如來具足諸功德，　　淨戒威儀悉圓滿，
translation: Endowed with virtues, the Buddha’s pure morality and comportment are perfect.

source_sentence: 四種魔軍智伏除，　　三界無與佛齊等。
translation: The four kinds of demon armies are subdued by wisdom, and the three realms are not equal to the Buddha's.

source_sentence: 如來定力無能動，　　非淺智者所能測，
translation: The power of the Buddha’s concentration cannot be shaken; It cannot be fathomed by anyone with shallow knowledge.

source_sentence: 行住坐臥定相應，　　現諸利樂神通事。
translation: Concomitant with walking, standing, sitting, and lying in meditation, he manifests the miraculous deeds of benefit and joy.

source_sentence: 如來勝慧無過上，　　於大眾中師子吼，
translation: The supreme wisdom of the enlightened is unsurpassed; He rouses the lion’s roar in the midst of the masses.

source_sentence: 善說妙法破群疑，　　攝化一切諸外道。
translation: He well explains the wondrous teaching to dispel all doubts, and he tames all non-Buddhists.

source_sentence: 如來身色超三有，　　種種相好遍莊嚴，
translation: The form of the Buddha’s body transcends all beings, Adorned with various features and embellishments.

source_sentence: 光明赫奕若金山，　　廣修檀施所獲得。」
translation: Their radiance is as brilliant as a mountain of gold that's obtained by extensively cultivating donations.

source_sentence: 以偈讚曰：爾時會中復有阿修羅王，名曰普耀，發清淨心，廣興供養，
translation: At that time there was also an asura king named Puyao in the assembly.

source_sentence: 一一供養與越三世阿修羅王等無有異。
translation: Each one of these offerings is no different from that of the asura kings who transcend the three worlds.

source_sentence: 作供養已，乘七寶車，繞佛三匝，復以眾妙珍寶散如來上，合掌向佛，
translation: Having made these offerings, they rode the seven-jeweled chariot and circumambulated the Buddha three times. Again, they scattered various fine jewels on top of the Tathāgata, joined their palms together, and faced him

source_sentence: 「我等捨離五欲樂，　　來詣佛所伸供養，
translation: Having renounced the pleasures of the five senses, We have come to this buddha’s place to make offerings.

source_sentence: 各見如來對已前，　　此不共德難思議。
translation: Each sees the Tathāgata before facing them, whose unique qualities are inconceivable.

source_sentence: 一音所演清淨法，　　或樂廣說或略說，
translation: The pure teachings expressed in a single voice They may delight in extensive explanation or in brief explanation.

source_sentence: 各隨意欲而解了，　　此不共德難思議。
translation: Each understands it according to their wishes, and this uncommon virtue is inconceivable.

source_sentence: 一音所演清淨法，　　隨其趣類各得解，
translation: The pure teachings taught in a single voice They understand according to the various states of being, According to their inclinations.

source_sentence: 如來善巧應其機，　　此不共德難思議。
translation: The Tathāgata skillfully adapts to their abilities, and these unique qualities are inconceivable.

source_sentence: 一音所演清淨法，　　或令修習或調伏，
translation: They teach the pure teachings of one voice, Causing some to practice and some to be disciplined.

source_sentence: 或有獲證諸果利，　　此不共德難思議。」
translation: Perhaps there's the benefit of realizing these fruits, which are uncommon and difficult to fathom in terms of virtue.

source_sentence: 以偈讚曰：爾時會中復有阿修羅王，名目真隣陀，發清淨心，廣興供養，
translation: At that time there was also an asura king named Mucilinda in the assembly.

source_sentence: 一一供養與普耀阿修羅王等無有異。
translation: Each offering is no different from that of the asura king Puyao.

source_sentence: 「如來善化於父王，　　捨除憍慢及邪見，
translation: “The Tathāgata skillfully transforms his father, getting rid of conceit and wrong views.

source_sentence: 令發堅固淨信心，　　此為最上無比子。
translation: Causing them to give rise to firm and pure faith is the supreme peerless child.

source_sentence: 法無自性從緣生，　　如夢受樂非實事，
translation: The dharmas lack self-nature and arise from conditions, like dreams that bring happiness but are not real things.

source_sentence: 應知彼樂隨想起，　　是則名了諸法性。
translation: You should know that they are pleasantly recalled, which is called comprehending the nature of dharmas.

source_sentence: 譬如秋空起浮雲，　　妄情執有非堅固，
translation: It's like the autumn sky producing floating clouds that deludedly cling to existence and aren't resolute.

source_sentence: 依於牟尼教法中，　　智者不應增我慢。
translation: Relying on the teachings of the Muni, a wise person shouldn't increase self-conceit.

source_sentence: 心善觀察不放逸，　　則於世間無所著，
translation: Their minds observe well without heedlessness, And yet they have no attachment to worldly things.

source_sentence: 是名安住佛法中，　　當證如幻三摩地。」
translation: This is called abiding in the Buddha's teaching, which will lead to the realization of illusory samādhi.

source_sentence: 作供養已，乘七寶車，繞佛三匝，以赤真珠，而散佛上，合掌向佛，以偈讚曰：時諸阿修羅王作供養已，
translation: Having paid homage to the asura kings, they boarded the seven-jeweled chariot and circumambulated the Buddha three times. They scattered red genuine pearls over him, joined their palms in respect toward him, and

source_sentence: 各各合掌，住立佛前，身意泰然，快得善利，皆發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: Each joined his palms, stood in front of the Buddha, remained calm in body and mind, quickly attained good benefits, and all aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊知諸阿修羅王心之所念，於大眾中現微笑相，即於面門放五色光，
translation: Knowing what the asura kings thought, the World-honored One smiled at the countenance of those in the great assembly and emitted five-colored light from his face.

source_sentence: 其光遍照普佛世界，繞佛三匝，復從世尊頂門而入。
translation: That light shone everywhere throughout the buddha world, circled the Buddha three times, and entered through the door at the top of the World-honored One’s head.

source_sentence: 時尊者馬勝覩是相已，從座而起偏袒右肩，右膝著地，頭面作禮，白言：「世尊！
translation: After these marks, Venerable Ma Śrīmālā rose from his seat, bared his right shoulder, knelt with his right knee on the ground, bowed his head and face, and said, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 以何因緣現斯瑞相？」
translation: What are the causes and conditions that give rise to this miraculous appearance?

source_sentence: 「人中最勝釋師子，　　現斯瑞相非無因，
translation: The most excellent among men is the lion of the Śākyas, Who manifests this sign of enlightenment without cause.

source_sentence: 唯願大悲為我說，　　聞已皆使心安泰。
translation: Please have great compassion and explain it for me, so that all who hear it will attain peace of mind.

source_sentence: 六十那由阿修羅，　　廣大淨心興供養，
translation: Sixty nayutas, the asura demons, With vast pure minds of great reverence, offered offerings.

source_sentence: 將非如來與授記，　　令彼聞已生歡喜？
translation: Wouldn't the Tathāgata give them a prediction that will make them rejoice when they hear it?

source_sentence: 時會咸作是思念：　　『放此光明非小緣，
translation: At that moment, the whole assembly had this thought:

source_sentence: 唯願如來愍我輩，　　為說現相之所以。』
translation: May the Tathāgata please pity us and explain the reason for our present appearance.'

source_sentence: 為當有發菩提心？　　或復初生於淨信？
translation: Why should there be an arousal of the intention to achieve enlightenment, or should pure faith arise first?

source_sentence: 如來各各悉了知，　　願決眾疑速當說。」
translation: Each of the Tathāgatas has fully known it, so please resolve your doubts and explain it quickly.

source_sentence: 「善哉馬勝大比丘，　　汝能諮問放光事，
translation: Excellent, O great monk Mahāsthāmaprāpta! You are able to inquire into the affairs of the glowing buddha.

source_sentence: 我今欲於眾會中，　　記別最上真實果。
translation: I now want to record the supreme, true fruit of enlightenment in the assembly.

source_sentence: 諸阿修羅興福業，　　志求無上大菩提，
translation: The asuras perform meritorious deeds, Determined to seek supreme enlightenment.

source_sentence: 貪恚障染悉蠲除，　　如手觸空無所礙。
translation: All the defilements of craving and anger are completely removed, like touching space with one’s hand without obstruction.

source_sentence: 由此發生清淨意，　　廣興無邊妙供養，
translation: As a result, they develop pure intentions and extensively produce boundless beautiful offerings.

source_sentence: 後當捨此修羅身，　　常生勝處增明慧。
translation: Later, you'll abandon this asura body and always give rise to superior wisdom that increases insight.

source_sentence: 未來過彼河沙劫，　　親近承事諸如來，
translation: In the future, past as many eons as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River, They will become intimate with and serve the buddhas.

source_sentence: 後身得作法中王，　　相繼成佛同名號。
translation: In the latter body, they'll become kings in the Dharma, and they'll successively become buddhas with the same name.

source_sentence: 皆稱最上燈如來，　　名聞普遍十方界，
translation: They are all called Supreme Lamp Tathāgata, Their names and reputations pervading the ten directions.

source_sentence: 教化六十那庾多，　　眾生聞法咸得度。
translation: Sixty myriads of koṭis of buddha-bodhisattvas taught and liberated, And sentient beings who heard the Dharma all attained salvation.

source_sentence: 國土廣博極嚴淨，　　盡一三千大千界，
translation: The vast expanse of the land is supremely magnificent and pure, Encompassing one thousand great chiliocosms.

source_sentence: 其中受化諸眾生，　　具足福德及智慧，
translation: The sentient beings therein who are taught Are endowed with virtue and knowledge.

source_sentence: 不造一切非法業，　　皆修平等安樂行。
translation: They don't create all kinds of unlawful actions, and they all cultivate equality and peaceful practice.

source_sentence: 彼佛皆說無諍法，　　聞者無著亦無礙，
translation: All those buddhas teach the Dharma without dispute, The hearers are not attached or hindered.

source_sentence: 佛壽六十那庾多，　　眾生住命等無異。
translation: The Buddha’s lifespan is sixty thousand yojanas: All sentient beings live as long as this, no different.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來化緣終，　　機感相從亦入滅，
translation: At the end of those buddhas’ apparitional conditions, The enlightening beings also enter into cessation.

source_sentence: 次第紹隆得作佛，　　國土壽量悉同然，
translation: In succession, Shaorong will attain buddhahood; The duration of life in all lands is the same:

source_sentence: 亦化如上諸有情，　　受持正法為佛子。」
translation: They also transform the above-mentioned sentient beings to accept and uphold the right teaching as children of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 合掌向佛，以偈問曰：爾時世尊以偈答曰：父子合集經卷第三
translation: At that moment, the World-honored One greeted the Buddha with joined palms and asked in verse:
